          <title>
            <string language="sv">Gräseldning</string>
            <string language="en">Grass burning</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grasbrennen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Brûlure d'herbe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Queimadura da grama</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Bruciarsi dell'erba</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κάψιμο χλόης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El quemarse de la hierba</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">En man i stövlar och kratta håller koll på brinnande gräs så att det inte sprider sig.</string>
            <string language="en">A man in boots holding a rake keeps an eye on the burning grass so that it does not spread.</string>
          </description>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Mann in den Aufladungen, die eine Rührstange
anhalten, hält ein Auge auf dem brennenden Gras, damit es nicht 
verbreitet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un homme dans les initialisations tenant un râteau 
garde un oeil sur l'herbe brûlante de sorte qu'elle n'écarte pas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um homem nos carregadores que prendem um ancinho 
mantem um olho na grama ardente de modo que não espalhe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un uomo nella tenuta dei caricamenti del 
sistema un rastrello mantiene un occhio sull'erba burning in modo che 
non si sparga.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα άτομο στις μπότες που κρατά μια τσουγκράνα 
παρακολουθεί την καίγοντας χλόη έτσι ώστε δεν διαδίδει.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un hombre en los cargadores del programa inicial 
que sostienen un rastrillo vigila la hierba ardiente de modo que no se
separe.</string>
          </description>
